trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_00<tab>The Allagan research node is silently awaiting user interaction.

TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_01<tab>You learn that a number of rapidly reproducing, monstrous chimeras have escaped from an Allagan research facility. The research node explains that they pose a severe threat to the local environment and must be immediately terminated. Slay two Allagan chimeras.
TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the horrifying abominations. Inform the research node that the immediate risk to the environment has been ameliorated.

TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_03<tab>The research node acknowledges your work and confirms that the threat to the environment has been mitigated. You learn that all attempts at creating composite life-forms have resulted in dangerous and psychologically unstable creatures, but it does not seem that the Allagan research node has any intention of putting limitations on its research.

TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_000<tab><blip> <blip> Transmission received from composite life-form research facility... <buzzzzzz> ...Congratulations. You have been selected to assist in a research experiment.

TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_001<tab>Sensors indicate escape by subjects in test chamber 167-B─accelerated chimera breeding program. Subjects present an extreme risk to the surrounding environment. Recommend immediate termination of associated Allagan chimeras.
TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_010<tab>To minimize irreparable damage to the local environment, please immediately terminate two Allagan chimeras.

TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_020<tab><blip> <blip> Extermination of chimeras confirmed. Thank you for your service to the Allagan research program. Your satisfactory performance has been noted.

TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_021<tab>Please be assured that, while all composite life-forms attempts to date have invariably been psychologically unstable and...<buzzzzzz>...research program will not waver in its pursuit of the noble goal of... <buzzzzzz>
